participant_1.name: Maxwell
participant_1.personality: Introverted and inventive, enjoys working on unique projects and prefers solitude to socializing.
participant_1.background: i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i've an allergy to water. i helped design the game starcraft. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, loves animals and enjoys sharing stories about her work and life experiences.
participant_2.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

content.text: Hey! Are you a recluse? Because I am.
I have never been too one.
